author: woonsan
msg: Fixing wrong order of elements in OpenIDLoginPortlet.
A <portle-info> tag defined after <portlet-preferences>, but according to the dtd this should be before <portlet-preferences> (and after <resource-bundle>).
Special thanks to Ruben Carvalho for pointing out this problem.
